name: Oil Sucker Extreme Mattifying Alkaline Primer
about: What it is: A non-comedogenic oil absorbing primer that delivers an immediate and extreme matte finish while tightening the appearance of pores. Extends makeup wear to up to 12 hours and dermatologist tested...Coverage: Light.Finish: Matte.Formulation: Liquid.Highlighted Ingredients: - Alkaline pH: Absorbs excess oil to visibly balance and mattify..- 15 Percent Mineral Silicate Complex: Tightens the appearance of pores..- Micro-Hyaluronic Acid: Visibly plumps and prevents dryness...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: The alkaline formulation in this primer helps to suck away excess oil from the surface of the skin, while Korean red ginseng revitalizes the look of skin and micro-hyaluronic acid prevents over-drying. The visible result: super-matte, super-snatched skin, and extended makeup wear with no flashback and an all-day reduction in shine. This dermatologist-tested product is noncomedogenic and wonu2019t clog pores...Clinical Results: In a consumer-perception study, 100% of subjects agreed that the primer:.- Immediately sucks away excess oil from the surface of the skin.- Provides pores with a tighter appearance.- Provides an extreme mattifying effect
ingredients: -Alkaline pH: Absorbs excess oil to visibly balance and mattify. .-15 Percent Mineral Silicate Complex: Tightens the appearance of pores. .-Micro-Hyaluronic Acid: Visibly plumps and prevents dryness. ..Water (Aqua/Eau), Sodium Silicate, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Hexylene Glycol, Glycerin, Propanediol, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Pentylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Caramel, Sodium Hyaluronate, 3-Aminopropane Sulfonic Acid, Calcium Hydroxymethionine, Polysorbate 20, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Caffeine, Panax Ginseng Root Extract. May Contain/Peut Contenir (u00b1): Red 40 (CI 16035), Yellow 6 (CI 15985), Yellow 5 (CI 19140).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..- Shake well before use. .- Start with a pea-sized amount on completely dry skin. u202f u202fu202f .- Spread a thin, even layer to oily areas only. Apply more as needed. .- For the best results, allow the product to dry for three minutes while remaining expressionless. ...Patrick's Pro Tip: .If you experience a white cast, tap the skin with damp fingertips to remove excess residual.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This primer helped me with my make up, it lasts now all day long, I have an oily skin and itu2019s amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This primer can be a little finicky (canu2019t use too much, have to blend it in exactly right or you get a weird white cast/build up), but holy cow, it really does block oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought it because I have really oily skin, but yes, it did do a job and get rid of the oil but I follow the instructions  the second that I put concealer and everything on top.my face felt so dry and it was so hard to blend.

reviews.review_title: The ONLY oil absorbing primer that has EVER worked
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m 71 with super oily skin, like a teenager. Iu2019ve probably tried every oil blocking primer ever sold. Then I tried this and it is working beautifully! Apply a teensy bit at a time, thinly and stay away from under eye bags!

reviews.review_title: Controls the oil slick that is my face!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have super oily skin and this I the only primer that holds that at bay all day. Love love love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This primer is by far the best primer Iu2019ve used ever ! As an extremely oily person, my face gets extremely oily after about 2 hours with no primer. Using this primer I was able to extend that out to 4-5 hours which is game changer for me. But you most definitely need to follow these instructions given to you. If you donu2019t, you wonu2019t see the benefit to this primer.
